item.title: Videographer Needed For Podcast Series In Sherman Oaks - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there, we're a Real Estate Development company and film on site interviews.

We need someone that has expereince with filming podcasts, knows how to recording video and audio for two person interviews.

We would prefer that you have at least 2 cams, 3 is preferred. Two cams would be tight on guest and wide cam.

It's important you know how to work with recording audio as well with lavs, neccasary mics and equipment.

Please send example of your previous shoots and your rate for coming on site, filming an hour interview and uploading footage for our editor.

Thanks!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 08:03 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
